name: Shimmer and Shine: Magical Genie Games for Kids
name_original: Shimmer and Shine: Magical Genie Games for Kids
description:
Shimmer and Shine: Magical Genie Games for Kids is an educational game developed by Nickelodeon.
Shimmer and Shine: Magical Genie Games for Kids is available on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
